Title: The Convergence of the Twain
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (executive story editor), Torrey Speer (story editor), Alyson Evans, Steve Kornacki
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman's date doesn't go as planned; Romero's frustrations reach a boiling point; Chick brings Norman a gift.
